name: Simplewebapp
tagline: This is a simple web app starter project with authentication, users, roles, and role management using NodeJS, Jade, and MongoDb
body:
### About SimpleWebApp
Developed by @tshrove to help developers with starting a simple web application using NodeJS, Jade, and MongoDB.
It contains:
* User Management
* User Roles
* Authentication
* Register and Login Page
* Admin Page
* Starter Homepage

### Support or Contact
Please contact me on twitter: @tshrove or by email at tshrove+github@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
